As an additional cost to play Harrow, sacrifice a land.

Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Canopy Surge
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you play this spell.)

Canopy Surge deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. If the kicker cost was paid, Canopy Surge deals 4 damage to each creature with flying and each player instead.

mc.name: Thicket Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you play this spell.)
When Thicket Elemental comes into play, if the kicker cost was paid, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. If you do, put that card into play and shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library.

mc.name: Thornscape Master
mc.oracleText:
{R}{R}, {T}: Thornscape Master deals 2 damage to target creature.
{W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

mc.name: Verdeloth the Ancient
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you play this spell.)
Other Treefolk creatures and Saproling creatures get +1/+1.
When Verdeloth the Ancient comes into play, if the kicker cost was paid, put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play.

mc.name: Blurred Mongoose
mc.oracleText:
Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Blurred Mongoose can't be countered.

mc.name: Jade Leech
mc.oracleText: Green spells you play cost {G} more to play.

mc.name: Elfhame Sanctuary
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, you skip your draw step this turn and shuffle your library.

mc.name: Pulse of Llanowar
mc.oracleText: If a basic land you control is tapped for mana, it produces mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type.

mc.name: Kavu Lair
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater comes into play, its controller draws a card.

mc.name: Restock
mc.oracleText: Return two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Remove Restock from the game.

mc.name: Bind
mc.oracleText:
Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Draw a card.

mc.name: Noble Panther
mc.oracleText: {1}: Noble Panther gains first strike until end of turn.

mc.oracleText: Flash Haste

mc.name: Slinking Serpent
mc.oracleText: Forestwalk

mc.name: Riptide Crab

Vigilance
When Riptide Crab is put into a graveyard from play, draw a card.

mc.name: Vicious Kavu
mc.oracleText: Whenever Vicious Kavu attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Aura Shards
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature comes into play under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mc.name: Plague Spores
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonblack creature and target land. They can't be regenerated.

mc.name: Recoil
mc.oracleText: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.

mc.name: Absorb
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.

mc.name: Frenzied Tilling
mc.oracleText: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Llanowar Knight
mc.oracleText: Protection from black

mc.oracleText: Protection from red

mc.oracleText: Protection from green

mc.oracleText: Protection from white

mc.oracleText: Protection from blue

mc.oracleText:
Vigilance
{G}: Regenerate Charging Troll.

mc.name: Horned Cheetah
mc.oracleText: Lifelink (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)

mc.name: Armadillo Cloak
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

mc.name: Samite Archer
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
{T}: Samite Archer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Teferi's Moat
mc.oracleText:
As Teferi's Moat comes into play, choose a color.
Creatures of the chosen color without flying can't attack you.

mc.name: Sleeper's Robe
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has fear.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

mc.name: Lobotomy
mc.oracleText: Target player reveals his or her hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and remove them from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

mc.name: Backlash
mc.oracleText: Tap target untapped creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.

mc.name: Cinder Shade
mc.oracleText:
{B}: Cinder Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{R}, Sacrifice Cinder Shade: Cinder Shade deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

mc.name: Cauldron Dance
mc.oracleText:
Play Cauldron Dance only during combat.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to play. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at end of turn.
You may put a creature card from your hand into play. That creature gains haste. Put it into your graveyard at end of turn.

mc.name: Yavimaya Kavu
mc.oracleText:
Yavimaya Kavu's power is equal to the number of red creatures in play.
Yavimaya Kavu's toughness is equal to the number of green creatures in play.

mc.name: Simoon
mc.oracleText: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

mc.name: Hunting Kavu
mc.oracleText: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Remove from the game Hunting Kavu and target creature without flying that's attacking you.

mc.name: Angelic Shield
mc.oracleText:
Creatures you control get +0/+1.

Sacrifice Angelic Shield: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Seer's Vision
mc.oracleText:
All opponents play with their hands revealed.

Sacrifice Seer's Vision: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.

mc.name: Smoldering Tar
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, target player loses 1 life.

Sacrifice Smoldering Tar: Smoldering Tar deals 4 damage to target creature. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.

mc.name: Fires of Yavimaya
mc.oracleText:
Creatures you control have haste.

Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Sterling Grove
mc.oracleText:
All other enchantments you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
{1}, Sacrifice Sterling Grove: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

mc.name: Heroes' Reunion
mc.oracleText: Target player gains 7 life.

mc.name: Aura Mutation
mc.oracleText: Destroy target enchantment. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play, where X is its converted mana cost.

mc.name: Kangee, Aerie Keeper
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {2}{X} (You may pay an additional {2}{X} as you play this spell.)
Flying
When Kangee, Aerie Keeper comes into play, if the kicker cost was paid, put X feather counters on it.
Other Bird creatures get +1/+1 for each feather counter on Kangee, Aerie Keeper.

mc.name: Ordered Migration
mc.oracleText: Put a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying into play for each basic land type among lands you control.

mc.name: Vile Consumption
mc.oracleText: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay 1 life."

mc.name: Spinal Embrace
mc.oracleText:
Play Spinal Embrace only during combat.

Untap target creature you don't control and gain control of it. It gains haste until end of turn. At end of turn, sacrifice it. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness.

mc.name: Undermine
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.

mc.name: Reckless Assault
mc.oracleText: {1}, Pay 2 life: Reckless Assault deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Blazing Specter
mc.oracleText:
Flying, haste
Whenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

mc.name: Meteor Storm
mc.oracleText: {2}{R}{G}, Discard two cards at random: Meteor Storm deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Æther Rift
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal a card at random from your hand. If you reveal a noncreature card this way, discard that card. If you reveal a creature card this way, put that card into play unless any player pays 5 life. If a player pays 5 life, discard that card.

mc.name: Artifact Mutation
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play, where X is its converted mana cost.

mc.name: Reviving Vapors
mc.oracleText: Reveal the top three cards of your library and put one of them into your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

mc.name: Armored Guardian
mc.oracleText:
{1}{W}{W}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
{1}{U}{U}: Armored Guardian gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

mc.name: Void
mc.oracleText: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with converted mana cost equal to that number. Then target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards with converted mana cost equal to the number.

mc.name: Pyre Zombie
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Pyre Zombie is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}{B}. If you do, return Pyre Zombie from your graveyard to your hand.
{1}{R}{R}, Sacrifice Pyre Zombie: Pyre Zombie deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Overabundance
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of the same type, and Overabundance deals 1 damage to him or her.

mc.name: Voracious Cobra
mc.oracleText:
First strike

Whenever Voracious Cobra deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.

mc.name: Sabertooth Nishoba
mc.oracleText: Trample, protection from blue, protection from red

mc.name: Dromar, the Banisher
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Dromar, the Banisher deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, choose a color. Return all creatures of that color to their owners' hands.

mc.name: Crosis, the Purger
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Crosis, the Purger deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, choose a color. That player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of that color.

mc.name: Darigaaz, the Igniter
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Darigaaz, the Igniter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, choose a color. That player reveals his or her hand and Darigaaz deals X damage to him or her, where X is the number of cards revealed of that color.

mc.name: Rith, the Awakener
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, choose a color. Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each permanent of that color.

mc.name: Treva, the Renewer
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Treva, the Renewer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, choose a color. You gain 1 life for each permanent of that color.

mc.name: Wayfaring Giant
mc.oracleText: Wayfaring Giant gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.

mc.name: Temporal Distortion
mc.oracleText:
Whenever a creature or land becomes tapped, put an hourglass counter on it.

Permanents with an hourglass counter on them don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, remove all hourglass counters from permanents that player controls.

mc.name: Coalition Victory
mc.oracleText: You win the game if you control a land of each basic land type and a creature of each color.

mc.name: Seashell Cameo
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

mc.oracleText: Creatures with power 1 or less don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

mc.name: Alloy Golem

Alloy Golem is the chosen color. (It's still an artifact.)

mc.name: Sparring Golem
mc.oracleText: Whenever Sparring Golem becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

mc.name: Urza's Filter
mc.oracleText: Multicolored spells cost up to {2} less to play.

mc.name: Tsabo's Web
mc.oracleText:
When Tsabo's Web comes into play, draw a card.
Each land with an activated ability that isn't a mana ability doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

mc.name: Tek
mc.oracleText: Tek gets +0/+2 as long as you control a Plains, has flying as long as you control an Island, gets +2/+0 as long as you control a Swamp, has first strike as long as you control a Mountain, and has trample as long as you control a Forest.

mc.name: Chromatic Sphere
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card.

Flying, protection from white

mc.name: Saproling Symbiosis

Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each creature you control.

mc.name: Wash Out
mc.oracleText: Return all permanents of the color of your choice to their owners' hands.

mc.name: Rewards of Diversity
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays a multicolored spell, you gain 4 life.

mc.name: Llanowar Elite
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {8} (You may pay an additional {8} as you play this spell.)

Trample

If the kicker cost was paid, Llanowar Elite comes into play with five +1/+1 counters on it.

mc.name: Dueling Grounds
mc.oracleText:
No more than one creature can attack each turn.
No more than one creature can block each turn.

mc.name: Tainted Well
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
When Tainted Well comes into play, draw a card.
Enchanted land is a Swamp.

mc.name: Searing Rays
mc.oracleText: Choose a color. Searing Rays deals damage to each player equal to the number of creatures of that color that player controls.

mc.name: Saproling Infestation
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player pays a kicker cost, you put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.

mc.name: Barrin's Spite
mc.oracleText: Choose a player and two target creatures that player controls. The player chooses and sacrifices one of them. Return the other to its owner's hand.

{3}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature.
{3}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

mc.oracleText:
Flying
Urborg Drake attacks each turn if able.

mc.name: Captain Sisay
mc.oracleText: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

mc.name: Protective Sphere
mc.oracleText: {1}, Pay 1 life: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice that shares a color with the mana spent on this activation cost. (Colorless mana prevents no damage.)

mc.name: Harsh Judgment
mc.oracleText:
As Harsh Judgment comes into play, choose a color.

If an instant or sorcery spell of the chosen color would deal damage to you, it deals that damage to its controller instead.

mc.name: Psychic Battle
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player chooses one or more targets, each player reveals the top card of his or her library. The player who reveals the card with the highest converted mana cost may change the target or targets. If two or more cards are tied for highest cost, the target or targets remain unchanged. Changing targets this way doesn't trigger this ability.

mc.name: Vodalian Merchant
mc.oracleText: When Vodalian Merchant comes into play, draw a card, then discard a card.

mc.name: Phyrexian Infiltrator
mc.oracleText: {2}{U}{U}: Exchange control of Phyrexian Infiltrator and target creature. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)

mc.name: Metathran Transport
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Metathran Transport can't be blocked by blue creatures.
{U}: Target creature becomes blue until end of turn.

mc.name: Tsabo's Decree
mc.oracleText: Choose a creature type. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all creature cards of that type. Then destroy all creatures of that type that player controls. They can't be regenerated.

mc.name: Stand or Fall
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your combat phase, separate all creatures defending player controls into two piles. Only creatures in the pile of that player's choice can block this turn.

mc.name: Quirion Sentinel
mc.oracleText: When Quirion Sentinel comes into play, add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

mc.name: Goblin Spy
mc.oracleText: Play with the top card of your library revealed.

mc.name: Wax
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.oracleText: Destroy target enchantment.

mc.name: Stand
mc.oracleText: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

mc.oracleText: Counter target noncreature spell.

mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

mc.oracleText: Target player discards a card.

mc.oracleText: Destroy target land.

mc.name: Assault
mc.oracleText: Assault deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
